text: Clint Hocking is a Canadian video game designer, that he usually worked at the Canadian website of Ubisoft, where he developed three websites, and he worked at LucasArts, Valve, and Amazon Game Studios. The first game that he made is Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell. ==List of all games that he made== Watch Dogs: Legion (2020) Far Cry 2 (2008) Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory (2005) Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell (2002) Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian people Category:Video game designers
title: Clint Hocking
